title: Wish & If Only
description: Learn to express regrets, desires, and complaints about the present, past, and future using 'wish' and 'if only'.

rules.title: Wish/If Only + Past Simple (Present Situations)
rules.explanation: Use 'wish' or 'if only' followed by past simple to express a desire for a different present situation. This structure shows that we want something to be different from how it actually is now.

examples.sentence: I wish I had more time to visit art galleries.
examples.translation: 미술관을 방문할 시간이 더 있으면 좋겠다.

examples.sentence: If only the concert tickets weren't so expensive.
examples.translation: 콘서트 티켓이 그렇게 비싸지 않으면 좋을 텐데.

examples.sentence: She wishes she could play a musical instrument.
examples.translation: 그녀는 악기를 연주할 수 있으면 좋겠다고 생각한다.

rules.title: Wish/If Only + Past Perfect (Past Regrets)
rules.explanation: Use 'wish' or 'if only' followed by past perfect to express regret about something that happened or didn't happen in the past. We cannot change these situations now.
rules.structure: wish/if only + subject + had + past participle

examples.sentence: I wish I had seen that play when it was on Broadway.
examples.translation: 그 연극이 브로드웨이에서 공연될 때 봤으면 좋았을 텐데.

examples.sentence: If only she had taken acting classes when she was younger.
examples.translation: 그녀가 어렸을 때 연기 수업을 들었다면 좋았을 텐데.

examples.sentence: He wishes he had appreciated classical music earlier in life.
examples.translation: 그는 인생에서 더 일찍 클래식 음악을 감상했으면 좋았을 것이라고 생각한다.

rules.title: Wish/If Only + Would (Complaints and Desires for Change)
rules.explanation: Use 'wish' or 'if only' followed by 'would' to express annoyance about a situation or a desire for someone to change their behavior. This cannot be used with 'I' as the subject after 'would'.
rules.structure: wish/if only + subject + would + base verb

examples.sentence: I wish people would stop talking during the performance.
examples.translation: 공연 중에 사람들이 말하는 것을 멈췄으면 좋겠다.

examples.sentence: If only the museum would stay open later on weekends.
examples.translation: 박물관이 주말에 더 늦게까지 열었으면 좋겠다.

examples.sentence: She wishes the director would cast more diverse actors.
examples.translation: 그녀는 감독이 더 다양한 배우들을 캐스팅하기를 바란다.

rules.title: Wish/If Only + Could (Ability and Possibility)
rules.explanation: Use 'wish' or 'if only' with 'could' to express a desire for ability or possibility that we don't currently have. 'Could' can refer to present or future situations.
rules.structure: wish/if only + subject + could + base verb

examples.sentence: I wish I could paint like that artist.
examples.translation: 나도 저 예술가처럼 그림을 그릴 수 있으면 좋겠다.

examples.sentence: If only we could afford front-row seats.
examples.translation: 우리가 맨 앞줄 좌석을 살 여유가 있으면 좋을 텐데.

examples.sentence: He wishes he could meet his favorite author.
examples.translation: 그는 자신이 좋아하는 작가를 만날 수 있으면 좋겠다고 생각한다.

rules.title: It's Time + Past Simple
rules.explanation: Use 'It's time' followed by past simple to say that something should happen now or soon. This implies that the action is overdue or necessary.

examples.sentence: It's time the theater updated its seating.
It's about time more people appreciated live performances.
examples.translation: 더 많은 사람들이 라이브 공연을 감상할 때가 되었다.

examples.sentence: It's high time the industry recognized independent filmmakers.
examples.translation: 업계가 독립 영화 제작자를 인정할 때가 한참 지났다.

rules.title: Would Rather + Past Simple (Preferences for Others)
rules.explanation: Use 'would rather' followed by past simple when expressing a preference for someone else's action. The subject after 'would rather' is different from the subject doing the action.

examples.sentence: I'd rather the film had a happier ending.
examples.translation: 그 영화가 더 행복한 결말을 가졌으면 좋겠다.

examples.sentence: She would rather the gallery displayed more local artists.
examples.translation: 그녀는 갤러리가 더 많은 지역 예술가들을 전시했으면 좋겠다.

examples.sentence: We'd rather the concert started earlier.
examples.translation: 우리는 콘서트가 더 일찍 시작했으면 좋겠다.

exercises.question: I wish I _____ to the premiere last week.
If only the museum _____ (not be) so crowded today.
She wishes people _____ using their phones during the show.
I wish I _____ (can) play the piano like that.
It's high time the city _____ more art programs.
If only I _____ (take) art classes when I was younger.

exercises.instruction: Rewrite expressing regret about the past
exercises.original: I didn't see the exhibition before it closed.
exercises.answer: I wish I had seen the exhibition before it closed.

exercises.question: I'd rather the film _____ so long.
She wishes she _____ (have) more talent for drawing.
If only the critics _____ kinder to new artists.
